body: Today, I want to know some about the new update. Please write to me. And old Avicus was better I think. I want to be sure about that Will I habit that?
body_tagged: Today, I want to know some about the new update. Please write to me. And old Avicus was better I think. I want to be sure about that Will I habit that?
title: Where is old Avicus?

replies.body:
It's better

it added two new gamemodes: CTW and SG

New Credits system
New Customizable "prestiges" or badges you obtain by using credits 

hub parkour
new lobby


Website:
Much faster
More Organized
Organized Leaderboards
